returns._0: The amount of ETH locked in Beacon chain

isConsumingScheduledOp().details: Returns true only in the context of a delayed restricted call, at the moment that the scheduled operation is being consumed. Prevents denial of service for delayed restricted calls in the case that the contract performs attacker controlled calls.

setAuthority(address).details: Transfers control to a new authority. The caller must be the current authority.

params.newPrice: The new price to set for minting VT

exitValidators(uint256).notice: Exits the validator from the Beacon chain

getNumberOfActiveValidators().notice: Returns the number of active puffer validators on Ethereum

getTotalNumberOfValidators().notice: Returns the total number of active validators on Ethereum

getValidatorTicketPrice().notice: Retrieves the current mint price for minting one ValidatorTicket

isOverBurstThreshold().notice: Returns true if the number of active Puffer Validators is over the burst threshold

provisionNode().notice: Increases the locked eth amount amount on the Oracle by 32 ETH It is called when the Beacon chain receives a new deposit from PufferProtocol The PufferVault balance is decreased by the same amount

setMintPrice(uint256).notice: Updates the price to mint VT

setTotalNumberOfValidators(uint256,uint2.notice: Updates the total number of validators
